issue.title: [R] refine record batch factory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3815](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3815). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
may be useful to handle `...`: 

- it should be named
- each value can be either an R vector, (converted with `array()`) or an Array
  
  So that we can have something like this: 
  
  
  {code:r}
  record_batch(x = 1:10, y = array(1:10))
1. currently have to go through tibbles
1. record_batch(tibble(x = 1:10, y = 1:10))
   {code}
